title.et: Ettevõtte loomise, juhtimise ja arendamise seminar II

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The Seminar of Entrepreneurship consists of three parts and the first part the students learn different business models and can create a business model for their idea. In the second part of the seminar students make a feasability study in cooperation with a laboratory/company on innovative product or service. In seminars the problems relative to the activities are discussed.
description.et: Ettevõtte loomise, juhtimise ja arendamise seminar  koosneb kolmest osast ja esimese osa jooksul õpivad tudengid erinevaid ärimudeleid ja oskavad oma ideele luua ärimudeli. Aine teises osas teevad tudengid innovaatilisele tootele/teenusele tasuvusanalüüsi koostöös labori/ettevõttega. Seminarides arutatakse tegevused läbi ja analüüsitakse tulemusi.

objectives.en: The goal of the course is providing students with the knowledge, skills and experience for commercialization of applications of materials science, planning, establishment and running of science-intensive small businesses.
objectives.et: Eesmärgiks on teadmiste, oskuste ja kogemuste andmine materjaliteaduse rakenduste kommertsiaaliseerimisel, teadusmahuka väikeettevõtte kavandamisel ja loomisel ning selle töö kujundamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the second part of the Seminar of Entrepreneurship, the student in cooperation with a laboratory/company has done feasabilty study on innovative product or service, found suitable technologies for it and analysed market study. In seminars he/she has discussed problems relative to these activities, with the other participants of the course.
learning_outcomes.et: Ettevõtte loomise, juhtimise ja arendamise seminari teise osa läbinud üliõpilane on koostöös labori/ettevõttega teinud innovaatilisele tootele või teenusele tasuvusanalüüsi, määratlenud selle toote valmistamiseks sobilikuimad tehnoloogiad, analüüsinud turusituatsiooni. Seminarides on ta arutanud nende tegevustega seotud probleeme teiste kursusel osalejatega.

independent_work.et: Making feasability study by instructions given in Moodle.

description.et: Feasability study presentation on selected business idea or company.

grade_evaluation.et: Participated in seminars and feasability study.

debt_elimination.et: If the above mentioned requirements are not met, consult with the lecturer.

resources.recommended_materials:
Wolfgang Runge_2014_Technology Entrepreneurship _A Treatise on Entrepreneurs and Entrepreneurship for and in Technology Ventures ( Karlsruhe Scientific Publishing) Part 1

Wolfgang Runge_2014_Technology Entrepreneurship _A Treatise on Entrepreneurs and Entrepreneurship for and in Technology Ventures ( Karlsruhe Scientific Publishing) Part 2

description.et: Introduction to seminar plan and terms for finishing the subject. First introduction to feasability study.
Making teams and selecting suitable challenge. Changed to new digital learning
Planning how to start and specify the challenge. Need to cover Technical, Economic, Schedule, Operational feasability
Going through the first steps and analysing how to make next steps with every group individually. Looking feasability templates.
Presentation of semester work and feasability study
